verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time, while he was yet shut up <S%H6113><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison <S%H4307><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the maker <S%H6213><s%> thereof, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that formed <S%H3335><s%> it, to establish <S%H3559><s%> it; the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%>;
Call <S%H7121><s%> unto me, and I will answer <S%H6030><s%> thee, and shew <S%H5046><s%> thee great <S%H1419><s%> and mighty things <S%H1219><s%>, which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, concerning the houses <S%H1004><s%> of this city <S%H5892><s%>, and concerning the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, which are thrown down <S%H5422><s%> by the mounts <S%H5550><s%>, and by the sword <S%H2719><s%>;

They come <S%H935><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, but it is to fill <S%H4390><s%> them with the dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, whom I have slain <S%H5221><s%> in mine anger <S%H639><s%> and in my fury <S%H2534><s%>, and for all whose wickedness <S%H7451><s%> I have hid <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from this city <S%H5892><s%>.

Behold, I will bring <S%H5927><s%> it health <S%H724><s%> and cure <S%H4832><s%>, and I will cure <S%H7495><s%> them, and will reveal <S%H1540><s%> unto them the abundance <S%H6283><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%>.

And I will cause the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%>, and will build <S%H1129><s%> them, as at the first <S%H7223><s%>.

And I will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them from all their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, whereby they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against me; and I will pardon <S%H5545><s%> all their iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, whereby they have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and whereby they have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me.

¶ And it shall be to me a name <S%H8034><s%> of joy <S%H8342><s%>, a praise <S%H8416><s%> and an honour <S%H8597><s%> before all the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, which shall hear <S%H8085><s%> all the good <S%H2896><s%> that I do <S%H6213><s%> unto them: and they shall fear <S%H6342><s%> and tremble <S%H7264><s%> for all the goodness <S%H2896><s%> and for all the prosperity <S%H7965><s%> that I procure <S%H6213><s%> unto it.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; Again there shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> in this place <S%H4725><s%>, which ye say <S%H559><s%> shall be desolate <S%H2720><s%> without man <S%H120><s%> and without beast <S%H929><s%>, even in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and in the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, that are desolate <S%H8074><s%>, without man <S%H120><s%>, and without inhabitant <S%H3427><s%>, and without beast <S%H929><s%>,

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of joy <S%H8342><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of gladness <S%H8057><s%>, the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bridegroom <S%H2860><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bride <S%H3618><s%>, the voice <S%H6963><s%> of them that shall say <S%H559><s%>, Praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>; for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>: and of them that shall bring <S%H935><s%> the sacrifice of praise <S%H8426><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. For I will cause to return <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, as at the first <S%H7223><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Again in this place <S%H4725><s%>, which is desolate <S%H2720><s%> without man <S%H120><s%> and without beast <S%H929><s%>, and in all the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof, shall be an habitation <S%H5116><s%> of shepherds <S%H7462><s%> causing their flocks <S%H6629><s%> to lie down <S%H7257><s%>.

In the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the vale <S%H8219><s%>, and in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%>, and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, and in the places about <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, shall the flocks <S%H6629><s%> pass again <S%H5674><s%> under the hands <S%H3027><s%> of him that telleth <S%H4487><s%> them, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Behold, the days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that I will perform <S%H6965><s%> that good <S%H2896><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> which I have promised <S%H1696><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

¶ In those days <S%H3117><s%>, and at that time <S%H6256><s%>, will I cause the Branch <S%H6780><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to grow up <S%H6779><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>; and he shall execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

In those days <S%H3117><s%> shall Judah <S%H3063><s%> be saved <S%H3467><s%>, and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>: and this is the name wherewith she shall be called <S%H7121><s%>, The LORD our righteousness <S%H3072><s%>.

¶ For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; David <S%H1732><s%> shall never <S%H3808><s%> want <S%H3772><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> to sit <S%H3427><s%> upon the throne <S%H3678><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

Neither shall the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> want <S%H3772><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me to offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and to kindle <S%H6999><s%> meat offerings <S%H4503><s%>, and to do <S%H6213><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> continually <S%H3117><s%>.
¶ And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; If ye can break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the day <S%H3117><s%>, and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the night <S%H3915><s%>, and that there should not be day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> in their season <S%H6256><s%>;

Then may also my covenant <S%H1285><s%> be broken <S%H6565><s%> with David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, that he should not have a son <S%H1121><s%> to reign <S%H4427><s%> upon his throne <S%H3678><s%>; and with the Levites <S%H3881><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>, my ministers <S%H8334><s%>.

As the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> cannot be numbered <S%H5608><s%>, neither the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> measured <S%H4058><s%>: so will I multiply <S%H7235><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that minister <S%H8334><s%> unto me.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Considerest <S%H7200><s%> thou not what this people <S%H5971><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The two <S%H8147><s%> families <S%H4940><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%>, he hath even cast them off <S%H3988><s%>? thus they have despised <S%H5006><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>, that they should be no more a nation <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; If my covenant <S%H1285><s%> be not with day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>, and if I have not appointed <S%H7760><s%> the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>;

Then <S%H1571><s%> will I cast away <S%H3988><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, so that I will not take <S%H3947><s%> any of his seed <S%H2233><s%> to be rulers <S%H4910><s%> over the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, Isaac <S%H3446><s%>, and Jacob <S%H3290><s%>: for I will cause their captivity <S%H7622><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725><s%>, and have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on them.
